summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing a lease of portions of Tracts "G", "H" and "I", Queen Supplemental Addition to Seattle, and a portion of the Ada Blackwell Tract; directing the Superintendent of Public Utilities and the City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk to enter into a lease with the Oregon-Washington Railroad & Navigation Company in respect to said lands for the use of the Municipal Street Railway for storage yard and track purposes, and setting forth the terms thereof.
